content: welcome to my newest design the long awaited abilee scarf this design was very much inspired of the shawl version i have written this design in uk terms with us terms written alongside in brackets there is also a simplified chart at the end to help you along for this pattern you will need any 4 ply yarn or a scheepjes whirl which is what i used i used the gorgeous blackcurrant squeeze me a 3 5mm crochet hook a sewing needle and scissors i highly recommend blocking your scarf once finished as the edges will curl in blocking will also open up the design more once blocked my scarf measured 77 inches by 18 inches if you do forget to download and save it please pop me a message and i will resent the link for you any other problems please pop me a message at suzy@daisyboo net happy hooking suzy x
